extraDescription: The Government of Canada is currently transforming its information technology (IT) environment through standardization, consolidation and reengineering. Treasury Board Secretariat, Chief Information Officer Branch is leading the development of the whole-of-government strategic direction supporting this transformation. The transformation will produce an IT environment that is more flexible, efficient and responsive to stakeholder needs.  The objective of the I4C contract is to secure professional services resources to support government-wide IT transformation initiatives.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
